sentences.english: There are several (portable) johns in the construction site.
sentences.chinese: 在建築場地有幾個姑且茅廁。

sentences.english: Regiments needed labor: extra hands to cook meals, wash clothes and dig latrines.
sentences.chinese: 部隊需要勞動力，需要人手做飯，洗衣，挖茅廁。

sentences.english: I've cleaned all the rooms except the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 除了茅廁，我打掃了一切房間。

definition: to whisper to one another's ear
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
sick personnel/person on the sick list/patient
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
to gesticulate/to make lively gestures (while talking)/also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚
see 驚慌失措|惊慌失措[jing1 huang1 shi1 cuo4]
lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom)/fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4
